assessment_steps.step_name: Step 4: Apply evidence to individual variant interpretation
assessment_steps.extracted_paper_info: The paper reports: 'The R615Q variant reduced telomerase activity by 75% compared to wild-type (p < 0.001, effect size = 2.3) and showed similar impairment to other pathogenic variants.'
assessment_steps.reasoning: Statistical analyses (p < 0.001, effect size = 2.3) provide strong quantitative evidence of the variant's functional impact.

overall_conclusion: The R615Q variant in DKC1 was shown to significantly reduce telomerase activity (75% decrease, p < 0.001) compared to wild-type and other pathogenic variants.
